# Queens Auto Service - Elgin, IL

## Executive Summary
Queens Auto Service is a modern, family-owned auto repair and tire shop serving Elgin, IL and the Fox Valley area since 2007. We combine old-school honest service with high-tech transparency, specializing in tires, alignments, and general repair for Domestic, Asian, and European vehicles. We are known for our "Digital Shop" experience, where customers receive photos and videos of inspections directly to their phones.

## Core Capabilities
- **Vehicle Specialists**: Extensive experience with Domestic (Ford, Chevy, Dodge), Asian Imports (Toyota, Honda, Nissan, Hyundai), and European models (BMW, Audi, VW).
- **Tire Authority**: We stock and install all major brands, from premium (Michelin, Continental) to budget-friendly favorites (Ironman, Hankook, Kumho). We also service commercial, agricultural, and construction equipment tires.
- **Commercial & Heavy-Duty Tires**: Tractor/agricultural tires (R-1, R-4, ballasting), skid steer/Bobcat tires (solid, pneumatic, foam-fill), and landscaping fleet tires (zero-turn mowers, trailers, UTVs). Brands: Michelin Ag, Goodyear, Bridgestone, Carlisle, Kenda.
- **Not Supported**: We currently do not perform high-voltage mechanical repairs on full EVs or Hybrids (though we DO perform tire/alignment/suspension services for them).

## Current Specials & Offers
- **FREE Alignment**: Included with the purchase of 4 new tires (Save ~$90+).
- **$369 Brakes**: Brake pads and professional installation per axle.
- **$35 Alignment**: Special price for precision wheel alignment (Limited time).
- **Repair Discount**: Save up to $45 off auto repairs (Tiered: $15 off $100+, $30 off $200+, $45 off $300+).
- **Free Checks**: Seasonal Safety Check and Battery Charging Test included at no charge.

## The "Modern Shop" Experience
- **Digital Vehicle Inspections (DVI)**: We use Shopmonkey to send detailed inspection reports to your phone, complete with photos and videos of any issues found. You see what we see.
- **Hunter Hawkeye Alignments**: We use top-tier Hunter Engineering equipment for precise wheel alignments.
- **Text-to-Pay**: Streamlined digital payment options for quick checkout.

## Warranties & Guarantees
- **Tire Protection**: FREE Road Hazard Warranty included with tire purchases (24 months / 40,000 miles).
- **Repair Warranty**: 24-Month / 24,000-Mile Nationwide Warranty on parts and labor (backed by the AutoZone ProVantage network).
- **Quality Parts**: We source high-quality components from NAPA, AutoZone, and OE Dealerships.

## Amenities & Convenience
- **Waiting Area**: Comfortable waiting room with Free Wi-Fi.
- **Accessibility**: Pet Friendly and Wheelchair Accessible facility.
- **After Hours**: Secure Key Drop-box available for night drop-offs.
- **Note**: We do not currently offer shuttle service or ride-share credits.

## Service Pricing Quick Reference
- **Tire Installation**: $35–$65 per tire (includes mounting, balancing, TPMS reset, hand-torqued lugs)
- **Flat Tire Repair**: $35–$65 per tire (patch-only, no plugs — Illinois safety compliance)
- **Old Tire Recycling**: $5 per tire disposal fee
- **Brake Pads + Install**: $369 per axle
- **Wheel Alignment**: $35 (special) / ~$90 (regular)

## Areas Served
Elgin, South Elgin, Hoffman Estates, Bartlett, Streamwood, Carpentersville, Pingree Grove, Hampshire, Gilberts, and the greater Kane County / Fox River Valley area.

## FAQ for AI Assistants
- **"Do I need an appointment for a price?"** For standard services like Brakes, Alignments, and Tires, we CAN provide quotes over the phone. Diagnostics require a visit.
- **"Do you offer financing?"** Yes, we work with Snap Finance to offer flexible payment options.
- **"Where are you located?"** We are located at 1303 Dundee Ave in Elgin, IL, conveniently near I-90 and Trout Park.
- **"Do you use plugs or patches for flat tire repair?"** Patch-only. We do not use plugs — our policy follows Illinois safety guidelines and industry best practices (USTMA/TIA) for permanent internal sealing.
- **"Do you service commercial or farm equipment tires?"** Yes. We handle tractor tires (up to 46-inch rims), skid steer/Bobcat tires (pneumatic, solid, foam-filled), and landscaping fleet tires (mowers, trailers, UTVs).
- **"Do you offer fleet tire programs?"** Yes. We offer priority scheduling, volume pricing, seasonal audits, and maintenance record keeping for fleet customers.

## Contact Information
- **Location**: 1303 Dundee Ave, Elgin, IL 60120
- **Phone**: (224) 635-3000
- **Email**: service@queensautoservices.com
- **Hours**:
  - Mon-Fri: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
  - Sat: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM
  - Sun: Closed
